desc: For science majors, learning to read the primary literature and other professional sources is an important transition from classroom learning to post-graduate endeavors. Students read, present, and discuss scientific literature in a field selected by participating faculty. The goal is to garner sufficient expertise to allow critical analysis of the particular field. Requires permission of instructor. May be repeated if topics are different.
name: Topics in Neuroscience
notes: Open only to seniors. Primarily for Neuroscience senior concentrators, but other seniors may also register with permission of the instructor.
title: Topics in Biological Research
